# Nabis Farmaci - Pharmacy Website

This is a React-based pharmacy e-commerce website that mirrors the design and functionality of skinpharmacy.com with Albanian localization and custom categories.

## Project Structure
- React 18 with Vite build tool
- Tailwind CSS for styling 
- React Router for navigation
- SQLite database for products and users
- Albanian language throughout

## Brand Guidelines
- **Name**: Nabis Farmaci
- **Colors**: Teal (#77BAB9), Green (#22c55e), Yellow accent (#eab308)
- **Font**: Inter
- **Language**: Albanian

## Key Features
- Exact mirror of skinpharmacy.com design
- Custom Albanian product categories
- User authentication and registration
- Shopping cart and checkout
- Cash on delivery payment
- Email verification for orders
- Admin panel for content management
- Mobile responsive design

## Development Notes
- Follow the exact layout and spacing from the reference site
- Maintain hover effects and interactions
- Ensure mobile responsiveness matches original
- Use Albanian translations for all text
- Keep the admin banner editable from admin panel
